resources.string: Your Download Count limit Per Day is over.... Please Try Again Later
Currently One Song is Downloading.... Please Try Again After Completed this Song.

The intention behind to prepare this application is to reach all Christians by songs and by listening this they will have to grow in spirituality.
 Here we provide at first version is.
 1) songs from different languages (Telugu,Hindi,English,Tamil,Malayan,Gujarati,Kannada, etc.).
 2) different ministry songs and different singer songs.
 3) Like this we are going to enlarge this application with new languages and more data(all most all songs in their language).
 4) First version we launched with small data we know that. we are currently working to collect the data from different users and sites.
 5) If you have any interest to help us, we are welcoming you.And one more thing is this application is going to add more features or data mostly based on user reviews and suggestions.
